articles.title: Shane Warne thought he had 30 years to live before he died of suspected heart attack - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lianne Young, 47, who had given Shane Warne relationship advice since 2015, said there was no hint of health worries and the cricket legend 'thought he had 30 years left' when he died at a Thailand villa.
articles.content:
Shane Warne thought he had decades to live and wanted to 'settle down with someone' before he died of a suspected heart attack, his counsellor has claimed.

articles.description: ROB DRAPER: Hyundai became the latest sponsor to suspend their marketing activities with Chelsea, while the Premier League disqualified owner Roman Abramovich as a club director.
